As a Malay family, they would ideally prefer Halal-certified kitchen equipment. However, due to the urgency of their needs, they are open to receiving non-Halal equipment and are prepared to cleanse these items independently to meet their requirements.

Sunbeam Place @ Children's Society requires 5pcs of English Weekly Revision (Assessment Book P1) for their service users study materials.
Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Mobile phone
description: Client’s family of 6 with 4 young children, resides in a 3 room HDB flat. The couple is facing some challenges that prevents them from seeking employment and are currently working closely with professionals to stabilize their family’s situation. As such, client is currently reliant on formal systems for financial assistance. With limited resources, client cannot afford a new mobile phone and would like to receive a donated one as it is important for her to be contactable by professionals who are working closely with the family as her current mobile phone has spoilt.

name: Baby clothes
